author: Fred Campbell
title: Democrats Have Neglected Online Privacy
text:
Mark Zuckerberg’s apology tour in Washington was commendable but beside the point. Facebook isn’t responsible for protecting Americans’ online privacy and can’t solve the larger problem on its own. That’s up to Congress, where efforts at online privacy legislation have languished for years.
Tom Wheeler, who served as President Obama’s Federal Communications Commission chairman, blames Republicans for “the absence of privacy policy in the U.S. in general.” He complains that the Federal Trade Commission allows internet companies...
